title: US stocks subdued after Trump's latest attack on Fed
content:
I've spent 48 hours analyzing Deep Dive: US stocks subdued a.
The results shocked me.

📚 What Everyone Believes:
"Deep Dive: US stocks subdued after Trump's latest attack on ..."

🔍 But Here's What They're Missing:
After analyzing the last 5 years of data...
This happens only 40% of the time.
📊 The Evidence:

📊 Key Numbers:
• Nifty: 24,712 (-0.75%)
• Sensex: 80,787 (-0.73%)
• FII: ₹+892 Cr | DII: ₹+1,765 Cr
• Top Sector: FMCG (+2.3%)
✅ The Better Strategy:
1. Watch for divergence between Nifty and Bank Nifty
2. Monitor DII flows when FIIs are selling
3. Focus on stocks with improving fundamentals
💭 Buffett's rule:
'Never lose money. Rule #2: Never forget rule #1.'

↓ What's your take on this?
